item.title: Two Pakistan nationals found staying in Yadgir and Raichur on long-term visas
item.description:
<![CDATA[A search launched by the police in view of the 24-hour deadline for eviction of Pakistan nationals staying in India has revealed that two Pakistan nationals are staying Yadgir and Raichur districts.
According to sources, one Pakistan national is staying in Shorapur of Yadgir district and the other is in Raichur.
The two women from Pakistan are married to men in these districts and are staying on long-term visas (LTVs).
â€œWe are waiting for orders from the government on the eviction process of ...]]>
